Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "two surveyors in wilderness, painting by Thomas Kinkade --ar 1:1 --v 5.1"
info.description: Draw cards to reveal terrain and a shape. Add selected terrain and shape to individual 11x11 grid board. Try to connect terrain pieces in patterns designated by goal cards. Play 4 rounds. Highest score wins.
info.helpText: Players take seats. Press restart button in lower right and choose map option. Players can view one map at a time, starting with their own. To change views, press the eye icon button below the player seat you want to view. The text below your seat shows which map you are viewing and is red if not your own. The number below the seats shows the current score. To begin play, press the +1 button to reveal a card. To draw on the board, click on the space to rotate through the 5 options. You can undo the current changes and revert back to the map state before the most recent card was drawn by pressing the Undo button. To score coins, click on the coin icon. After an ambush card is drawn, look at the arrows on the card and press the Swap Left or Swap Right button. Mark the map of the player whose map you are viewing by clicking the desired tiles. When done, click on the eye icon below your seat to view your own map again. When the time count for the current season is exceeded, the time display will turn red. At the end of that turn, players enter scores in the 4 places on the scoresheet. The math is done automatically. When done, press the Season button to set up the board for the next season.

fields.text: You are about to reset the board. Choose the map you want to work with and press the `Reset` button to continue.

fields.label: Slide left for Wilderness. Slide right for Wastelands.

fields.text: This will set up the board for the next season. This includes removing played ambush cards, adding a new ambush card, and suffling the explore deck. Scoring must be done manually by each player. Are you sure?

Sentinel Wood.goalText: +1 for every forest space next to map edge.

Treetower.goalText: +1 for every forest space surrounded on all edges by filled spaces or map edge.

Greenbough.goalText: +1 for every row and column with at least 1 forest space. Can score same forest space in both row and column.

Stoneside Forest.goalText: +3 for every mountain space linked to another mountain space by cluster of forest spaces.

Canal Lake.goalText: +1 for every water space next at least 1 farm space. +1 for every farm space next to at least 1 water space.

Golden Granary.goalText: +1 for every water space next to a ruins space. +3 for every farm space on a ruins space.

Mages Valley.goalText: +2 for every water space next to a mountain space. +1 for every farm space next to a mountain space.

Shoreside Expanse.goalText: +3 for every cluster of farm spaces not adjacent to a water space or map edge. +3 for every cluster of water spaces not next to a farm space or map edge.

Wildholds.goalText: +8 for every cluster of six or more village spaces.

Greengold Plains.goalText: +3 for every cluster of village spaces next to 3 or more different terrain types.

Great City.goalText: +1 for every village space in largest cluster of village spaces that is not next to a mountain space.

Shieldgate.goalText: +2 for each village space in 2nd largest cluster of village spaces.

Borderlands.goalText: +6 for every complete row or column of filled spaces.

Broken Road.goalText: +3 for every complete diagonal line of filled spaces touching left and bottom map edges.

Lost Barony.goalText: +3 for every space on 1 edge of largest square of filled spaces.

The Cauldrons.goalText: +1 for every empty space surrounded on all sides by filled spaces or map edge.
